entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Castlegar
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 AM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Castlegar Airport 10:32 AM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 1.9°C
Wind: SSE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating near noon then mainly cloudy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Snow level near valley bottom. Fog patches developing this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 17 January 2023
